item.description:
http://www.coolrunnin...


14th Annual
Genesis Battlegreen Run

Genesis Battlegreen 10k
Ralph Lord Memorial 5k
Memorial Cancer Walk 5k
Family Fun Run
November 1, 2009
Lexington, Massachusetts
Genesis Battlegreen Run
USATF certified 10k #MA98001RN and 5k #MA01032RN courses
Time: 10k: 12:15pm
5k : 12:15pm
Walk : 12:00 pm
Family Fun Run : 11:15am
Place: Registration in LHS gym - Worthen Rd entrance - opens @ 9:30 am
Races begin at the corner of Lincoln St and Worthen Rd
Distance: Genesis Battlegreen 10k
Ralph Lord Memorial 5k
Memorial Cancer Walk 5k
Family Fun Run
Entry Fee: 10K, 5K and Walk - $20 ($25 on Race Day)
Fun Run - FREE
Course Description: 10k - rolling hills through residential streets - flat last 3/4 mile
5K - short steep hill at one mile marker then downhill to flat finish
Course Records: 10k - Heidi Westerling 35:49
Mark Donahue 30:56
5k - Lansaa Bifano 19:34
Ben Strain 16:19
Age Groups: Top 3 male and females, top 3 (male/female) 19 & under, 20-29, 30-39, 40-49, 50-59, 60-69, 70-79, 80+ each race
Clydesdale and Filly awards
First Lexington Resident - male/female
Dana Home Trophy - male/female 80+
Awards: Trophies to top 3 male & female, medals to age groups
Top Three Teans each race (top three runners from each team score)
Amenities: Terrific post race refreshments including fare from local restaurants in the High School gym.
Winning Chip timing system by Bay State Race Services
T-Shirts: T-shirts to the first 250 paid entrants

T-shirts to kids participating in Fun Run
Sponsors: Major Sponsors include:
Genesis Consolidated Services, Inc
Boton Volvo Village
The Dana Home
Sartori Insurance Agency, Inc
Keith Asarkof, DMD
Leonard, Mulherin & Greene, PC
Directions: Rte 95 Exit 31A - At 4th set of lights take right onto Worthen Rd. Follow Worthen Rd through first set of lights and LHS is on the left. Ample parking in school lots.
Additional Information:

Race is held to benefit The Genesis Community Fund, Habitat for Humanity, the Ovarian Cancer Education Awareness Network (OCEAN)and the LHS Athletic Hall of Fame

Visit the Genesis Website
Contact: Call 781-861-6900.
E-mail steve@sartori-insurance.com

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Genesis Battlegreen 5k & 10k (Lexington)
